short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a `More Info` button to the recommendations on the details page on netflix.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When viewing the details of a movie or TV show on Netflix, the video cards in the sections "Collection" and "More like this" do not have a button that refers to the appropriate details page. This extension adds such a button to each of the video cards.
